description:
The day after finding Bruno, we ran into Lucas at a nightclub in Rio de Janeiro where he was bartending. He doesn't speak one single word of English, so it was lucky that we had our translator friend along (who also helped out with the direction in this video).
Lucas is one of those strong, silent types and he wasn't big on conversation. I wasn't used to working through a translator, so it was difficult to bring Lucas out of his shell. But what he lacks in banter he makes up for in looks... handsome face, muscular bod, and a great, uncut tool.
title: Lucas
